```{bash}

    bioawk -c 'fastx' \
    'BEGIN{JOBN=0} \
     { \
        if( (NR-1)%100==0 )\
        {JOBN=JOBN+1; \
        file=sprintf("../cache/homo_file_spam/short_seqs_removed/""ampin%d.fasta",JOBN);} \
        printf(">%s\t%s\n%s\n",$name,$comment,$seq) >> file \
        }'
```
